entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 29 December 2022
